statements: DELETE FROM biodegradable_waste_reports WHERE company_name = 'Green Solutions';
DELETE FROM biodegradable_waste_reports WHERE waste_category = 'Food Waste' AND waste_quantity > 1000;
DELETE FROM waste_sources WHERE compliance_level = TRUE;
DELETE FROM waste_sources WHERE compliance_level = false;
DELETE FROM WasteManagementCompanies WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM WasteManagementCompanies WHERE location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM compliance_history WHERE report_id = 100 AND regulation_id = 1;
DELETE FROM biodegradable_waste_compliance WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp' OR compliance_status = FALSE;
